text: José Fernando Mazariegos Anleu (21 March 1938 - 2 June 2018Fallece José Fernando Mazariegos, inventor del ecofiltro ), was a Guatemalan inventor. He was known for the creation of the drinking water filter called "Ecofilter", which was developed in 1990 as part of a project of the Central American Institute of Industrial Research and Technology (ICAITI).Fallece José Fernando Mazariegos, inventor del Ecofiltro ==Related pages== *List of scientists from North America ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Guatemalan people Category:Inventors
